programmes.show_description: Philip Chryssikos plays the best music across the early hours at the weekend. Send a message to Philip on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Eamonn Kelly gets your day off to the perfect start with the best music. Send a message to Eamonn on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
However you're spending your Sunday, Angie Greaves has the best music from 10am. Join Angie @smoothradio on socials to get in touch.
Tina Hobley has the best music. Send a message to Tina on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Margherita Taylor has the best music on a Sunday. Send a message to Margherita on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth"
Unwind with the most relaxing music, in the Smooth Sanctuary with Gary Vincent. Send a message to Gary on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Danny Pietroni closes out the day with the most relaxing music on Smooth. Send a message to Danny on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Paul Hollins has the best music through the night until 4am. Send a message to Paul on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Gary King with the best songs to start the day on Smooth Radio. Send a message to Gary on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Start the day with Jenni Falconer as she kicks off Smooth's "More Music Morning". Wake up with Smooth on your Alexa, just say "Alexa, play Smooth"
Tina Hobley kicks off her show from 10am with an hour of non-stop music!  Send a message to Tina on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth"
Paul Phear has the best music all afternoon. Send a message to Paul on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth"
Angie Greaves has the best music on Smooth. Send a message to Angie on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Unwind with the most relaxing music, in the Smooth Sanctuary with Darren Parks. Send a message to Darren on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
Martin Collins closes out the day with the most relaxing music. Send a message to Martin on your Alexa, just say... "Alexa, send a comment to Smooth Radio"
